thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com | 40 6
thread.title: Srdjan Jankovic
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Srdjan Jankovic

author: Srdjan Jankovic
title: Srdjan Jankovic
text: Reading good thing about TomTop made me come to a conclusion to go ahead and order the TomTop touchscreen/navigation system for my Mustang to replace the base model radio with the touchscreen system. When I got the shipement and installed it, I realized a few things wrong with the touchscreen. The colors were weird and purple along with the screen cracked a little on the bottom. This happens and I am not disappointed there, my disappointed comes when I send multiple emails asking for some customer support. I written those emails and describing my problem with no reply which by far is very disrespectful being that I spend over 300 dollars with TomTop. I am still patiently waiting for a reply that will probably never come. VERY DISAPPOINTED
